text: Ficus blepharophylla is a species of fig tree in the family Moraceae. The tree is endemic to Roraima state in northern Brazil. It is an IUCN Red List Endangered species. ==Sources== * blepharophylla Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Flora of Roraima Category:Plants described in 1984 Category:Endangered flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ficus blepharophylla
